name: Tasty
description: API to query data about recipe, plan, ingredients, etc... as on official site

api_methods.name: tips/list
api_methods.description: This endpoint is used to load tips (reviews)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The value of recipe id returned in .../recipes/list .../feeds/list .../recipes/list-similarities endpoints

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of items returned per response

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The offset of items to be ignored in response for paging
